data.title: Dashworks | AI Assistant for Workplace Questions
data.description: Dashworks unifies your company's data across tools to create a unified knowledge base. Ask questions in natural language and get precise answers instantly.
data.content:
Dashworks | AI Assistant for Workplace Questions
===============
              

[![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39397ff_Logo.svg)![Image 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939816_dashworks-logo.svg)](https://www.dashworks.ai/)

Product

[Features](https://www.dashworks.ai/features)[Bots](https://www.dashworks.ai/bots)[Integrations](https://www.dashworks.ai/integrations)[Slackbot](https://www.dashworks.ai/slack)[API](https://docs.dashworks.ai/)

![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939867_footer-border.svg)

Solutions

[Support](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/customer-support)[Sales](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/sales)[Engineering](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/engineering)[Product](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/product-management)

![Image 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939867_footer-border.svg)

Resources

[Blog](https://www.dashworks.ai/blog)[Security](https://www.dashworks.ai/security)[Changelog](https://www.dashworks.ai/changelog)

[Pricing](https://www.dashworks.ai/pricing)![Image 5](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939867_footer-border.svg)![Image 6](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939867_footer-border.svg)

Company

[About](https://www.dashworks.ai/company)[Careers](https://www.dashworks.ai/company#jobs)

![Image 7](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939867_footer-border.svg)[Log in](https://web.dashworks.ai/login)![Image 8](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939867_footer-border.svg)[Sign Up](https://web.dashworks.ai/signup?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=signup_button&utm_campaign=nav_bar)![Image 9](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939867_footer-border.svg)

[Book Demo ![Image 10](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393984b_dashworks-icon.svg)](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

[Get a Demo ![Image 11](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393984b_dashworks-icon.svg)](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

[Sign Up](https://web.dashworks.ai/signup?utm_source=homepage&utm_medium=signup_button&utm_campaign=nav_bar)

[Log in](https://web.dashworks.ai/login)

[![Image 12](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39395f6_x.svg)](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

AI that answers all your team’s questions  

============================================

Stop searching through endless tools and answering internal FAQs. Get instant answers with AI that searches all your company knowledge at once.

[Get a Demo ![Image 13](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393984b_dashworks-icon.svg)](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

![Image 14](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66922c468a3a4cc00a1f869e_homepage.jpg)

Dashworks powers AI answers for industry leaders, from hypergrowth startups to Fortune 500.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 15: Podium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6580d8e14a31f78cb282483b_Podium%20trusts%20Dashworks.png)

![Image 26: Pulley Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6789977e7c3f162054c2e5c3_Pulley%20logo.png)

![Image 27: User Interviews Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/65e23d0649878fc19dee5356_User%20Interviews_logo.svg)

![Image 28: Endeavor Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6580d8e1c9849fdc4d458f20_endeavor%20trust%20Dashworks.png)

![Image 29: Seso Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/674a9a730887cee9c57ebf09_kasada.svg)

![Image 30: Trium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/675bb826de2d00ca8ed457fa_gss.svg)

![Image 31: Seso Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/658e115446a2dae052c66501_sesolabor.png)

![Image 32: Tugo Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/662aaa681ed4698158d327ce_tugo_logo_en%201.svg)

![Image 33: Tugo Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/664b7c5f6414c9e36daed889_b%26w.png)

![Image 34: Seso Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66cdf6d8705ce244dc8af8b3_secondnature.png)

![Image 35: Tremendous Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6580d8e187b9edb525544d9d_Tremendous%20trust%20Dashworks.png)

![Image 36: Seso Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/674a9a7ed5b408c0e8d2385d_scentbird.avif)

![Image 37: Seso Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/674a9a4ea2e6aea6b3bf2a20_brand24-logo1.png)

![Image 38: Seso Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/674a9a7b95499ef97f652889_niagara.png)

![Image 39: Podium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/678826e7b9e856821812d9d4_EnterpriseSearchSoftware_MomentumLeader_Leader.svg)

![Image 40: Podium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/678827098d2ec91356d907cc_AIChatbots_EasiestToDoBusinessWith_EaseOfDoingBusinessWith.svg)

![Image 41: Podium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/678826aae6a659407abec78a_EnterpriseSearchSoftware_BestEstimatedROI_Mid-Market_Roi.svg)

![Image 42: Podium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/678827321ae52540869c48ad_KnowledgeManagement_HighPerformer_HighPerformer.svg)

![Image 43: Podium Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6788274d3a57996150e4d4f7_users-love-us-2025.svg)

![Image 44](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6616e3eea5501380d81e8130_thomas%20mancuso.jpeg)

Thomas Mancuso

Director of Product Partnerships

“Dashworks has shortened the onboarding time and response time for sales and support reps, and allowed product managers to focus on higher impact tasks like shipping features.”

![Image 45](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6580d8e14a31f78cb282483b_Podium%20trusts%20Dashworks.png)

![Image 46](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6616e5d8feabba23f22ccd4a_katrina%20drane.jpeg)

Katrina Drane

Director of Client Solutions

“The accuracy with which Dashworks answers questions, quickly digests all of our information, and brings it back in a way that makes sense for users, is huge. We spend way less time answering the same questions over and over.”

![Image 47](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6580d8e10ed64d7c33243ee1_ButterflyMX%20%20trusts%20Dashworks.png)

![Image 48](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6616c48019e16b949e6b4c12_ryangross.jpeg)

Ryan Gross

Head of Sales

“Dashworks has taken the burden off our engineering team and has given our sales team confidence in answering customer questions.”

![Image 49](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/65fb9060520b231d3d28d0ca_heygen.svg)

![Image 50](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66cf8ab9241d091151584cd3_enrico2.jpeg)

Enrico Robles Del Rio

Director of Data Analytics

“Dashworks is the best omni-search AI tool in the market that enables us to answer all kinds of questions using natural language and build workflows and bots. It's an excellent solution for us because we have a lot of fragmented information across various tools.”

![Image 51](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6580d8e1c9849fdc4d458f20_endeavor%20trust%20Dashworks.png)

![Image 52](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6616d1b58306c5cf91d29ff3_johnny%20quach.jpeg)

Johnny Quach

Chief Product Officer

“Dashworks is a game changer. It finds answers to questions we have about our business. Those answers are hard to gather from the billions of documents, Jira tickets, emails, and Slack messages we've sent. Dashworks pinpoints the exact thing and surfaces it to us.”

![Image 53](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/658e110079e299a03bab70d6_truecar.png)

![Image 54](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/65666a255d389a7a3b10f95c_Ramasubramanian%20K.png)

Ramasubramanian K.

Assistant Vice President, HR

“It’s one thing to have enterprise search, and another to have it integrated right into your Slack and browser. That’s where Dashworks definitely scored for us.”

![Image 55](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6580d8e23518ced5e0c073e9_Swiggy%20trust%20Dashworks.png)

Your AI assistant for workplace questions
-----------------------------------------

Say goodbye to information silos. Dashworks connects all your apps and provides a unified search experience, offering real-time answers to your team’s most pressing questions.

![Image 56](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6619482190021783d686e040_Frame%201991423593%20copy.webp)

Unify all your apps and knowledge bases

Connect all your apps, websites, and docs.

[Explore integrations](https://www.dashworks.ai/integrations)

![Image 57](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/661940bdbf678de085cb818f_Frame%201991423593.webp)

Get up-to-date answers with citations

Dashworks uses real-time search to ensure you always get the latest information from your apps.

[Learn more](https://www.dashworks.ai/features)

![Image 58](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/668f2cad5d8ebdfb01121c02_Group%201991423092.png)

Create and customize AI assistants

Create one or many bots for your use case, from new hire onboarding to product questions.

[Explore Bots](https://www.dashworks.ai/bots)

![Image 59](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/661948b28ebcafedc663614c_Frame%201991423593.webp)

Automatically answer Slack questions

Use Dashworks right in Slack or make it your team’s browser homepage.

[Explore Slackbot](https://www.dashworks.ai/slack)

![Image 60](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6619489f7e3b404916d179f4_Frame%201991423593.webp)

Enterprise-grade security from ground up

SOC-2 Type 2, GDPR, and HIPAA Type 2 compliant. Industry-leading AI that does not require data indexing.

[Explore security](https://www.dashworks.ai/security)

![Image 61](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/668f2980f4beafa35bb995c9_llm%20choice.png)

Future proof your AI strategy

  
Securely access AI models like GPT-4o, Claude, Gemini Pro, and Llama 3 in one place.

[Learn more](https://www.dashworks.ai/features)

![Image 62](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/661948668ebcafedc66311e3_Frame%201991423593.webp)

Get setup within minutes

  
Deliver immediate search capabilities to your team with just a few clicks, without lengthy indexing.

[Get started](https://web.dashworks.ai/signup)

![Image 63](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66678eef359c67a3fc645180_12%20plan.webp)

Flexible and transparent pricing

  
Simple pricing that adapts to your team's needs, no matter your size.

[See pricing](https://www.dashworks.ai/pricing)

THE OLD WAY

Legacy enterprise search duplicates your entire data
----------------------------------------------------

*   ![Image 64](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
    
    Up to **1 hour delay in syncs** lead to out-of-date answers
    
*   ![Image 65](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
    
    Requires **days to setup** to wait for initial sync to complete
    
*   ![Image 66](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
    
    Catastrophic **risk of security breach** from duplicating data
    
*   ![Image 67](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939872_pricing-cross.svg)
    
    Up to **1 hour delay in permission updates (ACL)** risk unintended leaks
    

![Image 68](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/671d2e703791608e19d642b2_Old_Way_Oct_26th.png)

[Learn more](https://www.dashworks.ai/blog/legacy-enterprise-search-systems-are-a-ticking-time-bomb)

THE NEW WAY

Agentic enterprise search finds the latest data live
----------------------------------------------------

*   ![Image 69](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
    
    **0 second delay** from live search ensures up-to-date answers
    
*   ![Image 70](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
    
    **Instant setup in minutes** due to no sync required
    
*   ![Image 71](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
    
    Support for **zero-data retention** for maximum security
    
*   ![Image 72](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939837_check-icon-light.svg)
    
    **Instant permission updates** ensure ACLs are respected at all times
    

![Image 73](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/671d76ab1d2c2b429092f217_live-search.png)

[Learn more](https://www.dashworks.ai/blog/privacy-first-enterprise-search-why-dash-ai-ditched-indexing)

One AI assistant,  
customizable for every team’s needs
-------------------------------------------------------

Dashworks bridges information gaps across your teams and provides quick and accurate answers to questions about your product, processes, policies, projects, people, and more.

[![Image 74](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393984e_customer-success.svg) Support](https://www.dashworks.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0)[![Image 75](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939829_sales-icon.svg) Sales](https://www.dashworks.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1)[![Image 76](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939827_engineering-icon.svg) Engineering](https://www.dashworks.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2)[![Image 77](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/6564f1a6b003d2f4a393982a_marketing-icon.svg) Product](https://www.dashworks.ai/#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3)

Reduce response times, increase satisfaction
--------------------------------------------

Enable fast and accurate responses to customers by empowering support reps with quick access to information buried in historical tickets, support docs, and product wikis.

[Explore Customer Support](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/customer-success)

![Image 78](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66c75213ed5f21b4964a38f7_cs-2.png)

[Explore All Features](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

Close deals faster  
with instant answers
-----------------------------------------

Enable your sales team to confidently self-serve answers to customer questions, reducing response times and shortening sales cycles.

[Explore Sales](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/sales)

![Image 79](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66ce0cd5285f8965a057fd55_sales-1.png)

[Explore All Features](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

Unblock engineers,  
unlock velocity
------------------------------------

Get instant help with resolving on-call issues, fixing bugs, and finding answers to technical questions by enabling engineers to search across their codebase, docs, issues, and Slack threads, all in one place.

[Explore Engineering](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/engineering)

![Image 80](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66c74f62aa01725a1a215180_engineering-3.png)

[Explore All Features](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

Faster product insights,  
less team FAQs
-----------------------------------------

Dashworks unifies your product data across tools to create a unified knowledge base. Ask product questions in natural language and get precise answers instantly.

[Explore Product Management](https://www.dashworks.ai/solutions/product-management)

![Image 81](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39394ed/66c754a5f8a8d655a12de76d_product-1.png)

[Explore All Features](https://www.dashworks.ai/#)

![Image 95](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939513/6564f1a6b003d2f4a39398ed_dropbox%20logo.svg)

![Image 96](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939513/676cfea38d6d7f73dac26da7_Figma-logo.svg)

![Image 97](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6564f1a6b003d2f4a3939513/667404ff5e08bff83c5d52b0_frontapp-svgrepo-com.png)
